ingredients.item: 450g pack Waitrose Gourmet Pork Sausagemeat Stuffing

instructions.step: Boil the potatoes for 10 minutes until tender and mash with the milk and seasoning. Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the sausagemeat for 3 minutes.
Add the leeks and cook for 3-4 minutes, stir in the sage and apple then transfer to an ovenproof serving dish and top with the mash. Bake at 200ËšC, gas mark 6, for 15-20 minutes.
